name.en: Advanced blockchain applications and its privacy protection
name.ch: 進階區塊鏈應用與隱私防護

goal.ch:
1. 了解區塊鏈原理設計概念 
2. 了解各類區塊鏈系統安全設計
3. 分辨區塊鏈技術的優、缺點
4. 了解密碼學相關技術背景及工具
5. 研讀、分析大量最新區塊鏈學術論文
6. 學習如何加強區塊鏈與智慧合約的隱私防護

*本課程適用「研究所學生」，或者欲就讀研究所的大三、四學生，會大量看上述主題最新「學術論文」並且上台報告、討論論文內容細節。
goal.en:
1. Understand the design fundamental of Blockchain
2. Understand the security design of various blockchain
3. Realize the pros and cons of blockchain technology
4. Understand the various cryptographic background and tools  
5. Survey and analyze a lot of innovative blockchain research
6. Learn the ability of enhancing the privacy issue of Blockchain and smart contract

*This course is intended for “graduate students“ or third- and fourth-year undergraduate students who intend to pursue graduate studies. Students will extensively study the latest “academic papers“ on the aforementioned topics and give presentations on and discuss the details of the papers.
